      public void addToStrongbox​(ResourceAmount[] res)
      This method adds resources to the strongbox
      Parameters:
      res - is the array of resources.

    • getDeposits

      public java.util.ArrayList<ResourceAmount> getDeposits()
      This method returns a copy of the player's deposits.

    • setDeposits

      public void setDeposits​(java.util.ArrayList<ResourceAmount> newDeps)
      This method is used to set the new state of the player's deposits.
      Parameters:
      newDeps - : list of the player's deposits in the new state

    • swapDeposits

      public void swapDeposits​(java.lang.String source, java.lang.String dest) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used to swap the contents of two deposits if possible. If one of the two is a leader deposit, the method moves all the resources that can be put in the destination's deposit (if the resources are the same).
      Parameters:
      source - : the String representation of the first deposit to swap
      dest - : the String representation of the second deposit to swap
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - when the contents of the two deposits can't be swapped (too many resources for one of the two deposits to contain them), when the player tries to put a resource in a leader deposit that is of a different kind, when a player tries to swap a leader deposit but he doesn't have it, or when a player tries to swap two leader deposits (it cannot be done).

    • parseDepIndex

      private int parseDepIndex​(java.lang.String dep)
      Utility method use to parse the String representation of the chosen deposit in the correspondent index of the List.
      Parameters:
      dep - : the String representation to parse

    • addSpecialDeposit

      public void addSpecialDeposit​(Color color)
      This method is used when a ResourceLeader is activated. It adds a special deposit to the list.
      Parameters:
      color - : the color of the resource that the special deposit can contain

    • getSlot

      public DevelopCard[] getSlot​(int index) throws InvalidActionException
      This method is used at the end of the game to check the victoryPoints given by each DevelopCard bought by the Player
      Parameters:
      index - : the index of the slot to return
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException

    • getTopCard

      public DevelopCard getTopCard​(int index) throws InvalidActionException
      This method returns the top card of the selected slot. It is used to check if a card can be put in the slot and when a Player wants to activate the production of the card in the selected slot.
      Parameters:
      index - : the index of the selected slot from which to get the card
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException

    • addCard

      public void addCard​(int index, DevelopCard card, boolean isLeader)
      This method adds a card to the selected slot when a Player correctly buys the card or activates a LevTwoLeader.
      Parameters:
      index - : the index of the selected slot where to put the card
      card - : the card bought by the player or the extra production card of the activated leader
      isLeader - : used to check if the card is a extra production card of a LevTwoLeader

    • getStrongbox

      public ResourceAmount[] getStrongbox()
      This method returns a copy of the strongbox.
      Returns:
      the strongbox.

    • setStrongbox

      public void setStrongbox​(ResourceAmount[] strongbox)
      This method changes the strongbox reference.
      Parameters:
      strongbox - is the new strongbox reference.

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell​(int pos)
      This method returns the Cell at that index.
      Parameters:
      pos - is the index.
      Returns:
      the Cell at that index.

    • getTileState

      public boolean getTileState​(int pos)
      This method returns the state of a FavorTile at a specific index.
      Parameters:
      pos - is the index of the FavorTile.
      Returns:
      the state of the FavorTile.

    • getTile

      public FavorTile getTile​(int pos)
      This method returns the FavorTile in the selected index
      Parameters:
      pos - is the index of the position in the Faith Track
      Returns:
      the FavorTile

    • setTile

      public void setTile​(int pos, boolean status)
      This method changes the status of a FavorTile at a specific index.
      Parameters:
      pos - is the index of the FavorTile.
      status - is the new status of the FavorTile.
